resources.string: The device does not support the functionality of the application.

We use an advertising network to serve ads.

The advertising network may collect data, including your device\'s advertising identifier, to serve personalized ads.

You can allow or turn off ad personalization.

If you turn off personalization, we will only serve non-personalized ads.

The app processes the following types of data:

1. Mobile network signal strength.
2. Data transfer type.
3. Slot number of the active SIM card.
4. SIM card name.

To retrieve this SIM card-related data, the app will request permission to manage calls.

For more details, click on the Privacy icon.

This app includes open source and third-party libraries:

1. MPAndroidChart https://github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart/
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0.
Author: Philipp Jahoda (PhilJay)

2. Free data Animation https://lottiefiles.com/free-animation/data-V8HWwl7oWO
Licensed under the Lottie Simple License (FL 9.13.21)
Author: Revital Cahani

The following data type notations are used in the app:

5G - it means NR (New Radio)
4G - it means LTE
3G - it means one of HSDPA, HSUPA, HSPA, EVDO_B, EHRPD, UMTS.
2G - it means one of EDGE, GPRS, CDMA, 1xRTT, IDEN.
xG - it means unknown, because no data transfer.

The app is not a measurement tool.
The data displayed on the graphs is generated, taking into account the information received from your device. And may differ from the actual data.

Full Privacy Policy Here

Last updated: January 01, 2025

Collection and Use Data

Types of Data Collected : Usage Data:

Usage Data is collected automatically when you use the Service.

Usage Data may include information such as the time and date of use of the app, time spent in the app, the number of active SIM cards in the phone, the name of the SIM card, the signal strength of the SIM card, the type of data transfer used by the SIM card.

The collected data is used only in the app itself, including in the user interface.

The SIM card slot number and name are used to display to the user the active SIM cards with which the app can work.
The SIM card slot number and name are used in the name of the files created by the app, which store the history of changes in the network signal strength and the type of data transfer.

The data in the files is stored in the format (minute per day, data transfer type, network signal strength).

Storage of your personal data:

The Company does not store your personal or other data.
Usage data is stored on your device in the app folder (/Android/data/com.safelogj.simlog/files/).

Delete your collected data:

You have the right to delete all files with collected data in the app folder (/Android/data/com.safelogj.simlog/files/).

Links to other sites:

Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us.
If you click on a third party link, you will be redirected to that third party\'s site.
We strongly encourage you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.

We have no control over, and are not responsible for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party sites or services.

Contact Us:

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us:

By email: morebass304@gmail.com
